fr.rktv.iamcore.services.dao.impl

Class AuthHibernateDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.rktv.iamcore.services.dao.impl.AuthHibernateDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthDAOInterface

    public class AuthHibernateDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthDAOInterface
    DAO class implements user authentication using AuthDAOInterface With help of hibernate and Datasource storing user details to derby database
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rahul Thai Valappil
